languages.text: "Я никогда не думала, что подобное буйство жизни может существовать где-то. Почему Неумирающий не позволяет ему быть в пустоте, где обретаемся мы?"
languages.translation_comment: Cassia: "I've never seen so many plants before, not even in our arboretum... Oh, that flower there! I read about it in one of that works by Genetor Kanassian."

languages.text: "I never thought such a riot of life could exist anywhere. Why does the Undying One not allow such things in the void, where we dwell?"
languages.original_text: "Я никогда не думала, что подобное буйство жизни может существовать где-то. Почему Неумирающий не позволяет ему быть в пустоте, где обретаемся мы?"

traits.locale_text: "I never thought such a riot of life could exist anywhere. Why does the Undying One not allow such things in the void, where we dwell?"
"I never thought such a riot of life could exist anywhere. Why does the Undying One not allow such things in the void, where we dwell?"
"I never thought such a riot of life could exist anywhere. Why does the Undying One not allow such things in the void, where we dwell?"
"I never thought such a riot of life could exist anywhere. Why does the Undying One not allow such things in the void, where we dwell?"
"I never thought such a riot of life could exist anywhere. Why does the Undying One not allow such things in the void, where we dwell?"

languages.text: "Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass irgendwo ein solches Übermaß an Leben existieren kann. Warum gestattet der Todlose so etwas nicht in der Leere, wo wir hausen?"
languages.original_text: "I never thought such a riot of life could exist anywhere. Why does the Undying One not allow such things in the void, where we dwell?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass irgendwo ein solches Übermaß an Leben existieren kann. Warum gestattet der Todlose so etwas nicht in der Leere, wo wir hausen?"

languages.text: « Je n'aurais jamais imaginé qu'une telle débauche de vie puisse prospérer quelque part. Pourquoi l'Immortel ne permet-il pas ce genre de choses dans le vide, notre demeure éternelle ? »
languages.original_text: "I never thought such a riot of life could exist anywhere. Why does the Undying One not allow such things in the void, where we dwell?"

traits.locale_text: « Je n'aurais jamais imaginé qu'une telle débauche de vie puisse prospérer quelque part. Pourquoi l'Immortel ne permet-il pas ce genre de choses dans le vide, notre demeure éternelle ? »

languages.text: «No pensaba que semejante tumulto de vida pudiera existir. ¿Por qué el Inmortal no permite tales cosas en el vacío, donde vivimos?».
languages.original_text: "I never thought such a riot of life could exist anywhere. Why does the Undying One not allow such things in the void, where we dwell?"

traits.locale_text: «No pensaba que semejante tumulto de vida pudiera existir. ¿Por qué el Inmortal no permite tales cosas en el vacío, donde vivimos?».

languages.text: 「このような生命の乱舞がどこにでも存在するとは思いませんでした。なぜ不死の者は、私たちの住む虚空にそのようなものの存在を許してくれないのでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "I never thought such a riot of life could exist anywhere. Why does the Undying One not allow such things in the void, where we dwell?"

traits.locale_text: 「このような生命の乱舞がどこにでも存在するとは思いませんでした。なぜ不死の者は、私たちの住む虚空にそのようなものの存在を許してくれないのでしょう？」

languages.text: “我从没想过这个地方居然会如此生机勃勃。为什么不死之神不允许我们居住的虚空之中拥有同样的生机？”
languages.original_text: "I never thought such a riot of life could exist anywhere. Why does the Undying One not allow such things in the void, where we dwell?"

traits.locale_text: “我从没想过这个地方居然会如此生机勃勃。为什么不死之神不允许我们居住的虚空之中拥有同样的生机？”

languages.original_text: "I never thought such a riot of life could exist anywhere. Why does the Undying One not allow such things in the void, where we dwell?"

languages.text: "Bu kadar şamatalı bir hayatın mümkün olduğunu hiç düşünmemiştim. Ölmeyen, neden ömrümüzün geçtiği uçsuzda böyle şeylere müsaade etmiyor?"
languages.original_text: "I never thought such a riot of life could exist anywhere. Why does the Undying One not allow such things in the void, where we dwell?"
